description: Common disease of hereditary or environmental cause, with usual early onset in the hereditary case, may appear at any stage in life.
treatment: reduce exposure to allergens, salbutamol or another bronchodilator if shortness of breath, prednisone or similar corticosteroid if in crisis.

symptoms: Strong pain on one side of the head, around the eye, commonly described as burning, stabbing or drilling
description: Neurological disorder characterized by severe headaches, symptoms ussualy last from 15 minutes to 3 hours.
treatment: Verapamil as preventive therapy, glucocorticoids as complementary medicine for the first 8 to 10 days, surgery in case of very severe cases that do not improve with other alternatives
